mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Marshall University Archives and Special Collections
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sternwheel ferryboat Paul F.Thomas, July 1, 1936, black and white photograph. This boat ran from Proctorville, Ohio to Huntington, WV. It was based at Proctorville. Original sleeve contained several photos and negatives of a man and his family, assumed to be Paul F. Thomas (the man.).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Boats
Ferries
Stern wheelers
Paddle steamers
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sternwheel ferryboat Paul F. Thomas
